title: Winery Dinner
body: One of our most popular events! Start with a late afternoon wine tasting at one or two wineries, followed by a fully catered dinner at one of the Santa Ynez Valley's premier wineries. Experience the beautiful views of the vineyards and the rolling hills while enjoying a delicious Chicken & Tri-Tip BBQ dinner. This event can be completely customized based on your groups budget and any time constraints. Some options we have done in the past include: large group tours of the wine making process, barrel room tastings, live bands with dinner & more. This event is great for groups with as few as 15 guests as well as groups of 100 or more!
